game.name: Remi
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An action RPG about Remi, the last remaining member of the Vanguard. Engage in challenging combat with the Plagued, mind-controlled enemies to fulfill Remi's oath to save the world from these monsters. A passion project made by a single developer.
